text: There are aliensalienplacesgalaxiesaliensout there, somewhere. I strongly believe this. Not sure what they look like, though. I really certaindoubtdubiousdoubtfuldoubtthey are green, like they are in science theaterfictionfactiousstoryfictionmovies. I also don’t think they look like us. But I’m sure they exist. I just don’t think we’ll ever see any or find any. They live too far distanceawayapartdisplaceaway. If you think about it logicallyemotionallylogicabstractlylogically, there has to be aliens out there. All a planetstargalaxysupernovaplanetneeds is to be warm and have water and life will exist. There are billions and billions of planets in the universeuniversityearthcontinentsuniverse, so there are probably millions and millions that have life. Alien life. It’s also likely that some of the aliens are much more intelligent than we are. I wonder what we’d do if really intelligent aliens visited Earth. What would we ask them?
